cmt-001.comment: CS 1.6 is the best FPS of all time! Nostalgia overload.

cmt-002.comment: I still remember playing LAN parties with my friends. Good times!

cmt-003.comment: De_Dust2 is legendary. No game has the same feel as CS 1.6!

cmt-004.comment: Super Mario Bros. defined my childhood!

cmt-005.comment: I still can't believe how fun this game is, even after decades!

cmt-006.comment: Jumping on Goombas never gets old. Classic gameplay!

cmt-007.comment: The original Zelda is still one of the best adventure games ever!

cmt-008.comment: I love the open-world feel. This game was ahead of its time.

cmt-009.comment: Master Sword, dungeons, and epic questsâ€”this game has it all!

cmt-010.comment: Doom is the reason FPS games are what they are today!

cmt-011.comment: Nothing beats blasting demons with a shotgun in Doom!

cmt-012.comment: Rip and tear! This game still holds up after all these years.

cmt-013.comment: Pac-Man is simple, yet so addictive!

cmt-014.comment: I always get stuck on level 256! Classic bug.

cmt-015.comment: Those ghosts always get me! Still love this game.
